name: Bela's Blades, The Offshore Firm (2021)
description:
“Bela's Blades”
The Offshore Firm (2021)
GIF, 1008 x 720 px


///// The worse question one could ask at Bela's shop was who made the blades. It was a cringe question that sucked all the air out of the room. You just don't ask that in front of a master bladesmith. Bela would scoff and immediately tell you to get out. I've seen it happen, usually to some fuddy-dud dude who never listens. Bella ran their smithy like a boutique though and it felt quaint for a place covered in sharp blades. The Offshore Firm just picked up a few pieces every month and funneled them through their auction houses and art institutions, the rest was up to Bela. "What if Bela get's tired of this scheme?" a museum director once asked. "What are they going to do? Stab us?" /////

Metarealistic game photography depicting hypercorporate, antisocial, and sometimes liminal virtual environments.

This photographed scene was created using "The Life Stage: Virtual House," a building design simulator released in 1993 for the 3DO console.

Although the game has fallen into obscurity, it was notably ahead of its time for its use of photographic gameplay elements within an immersive 3D virtual space.

// Artwork by Sabato Visconti // www.sabatobox.com // @sabatobox on IG //
